body_html:
I ran into the same problem today, only running on Redhat 7.2 instead. @vadimkantorov I removed my initial PyTorch install and any other clones that I had, but that didn't help. I followed the solution in 3571 and got it to work. Here's my diff:

diff --git a/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h b/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h
index 9ef474d..69a8f91 100644
--- a/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h
+++ b/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h
@@ -1,5 +1,8 @@
 #pragma once
 
+#define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS
+#include <inttypes.h>
+
 $th_headers
 
 #include "ATen/Tensor.h"

body:
I ran into the same problem today, only running on Redhat 7.2 instead. @vadimkantorov I removed my initial PyTorch install and any other clones that I had, but that didn't help. I followed the solution in [3571](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3571) and got it to work. Here's my diff:

```
diff --git a/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h b/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h
index 9ef474d..69a8f91 100644
--- a/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h
+++ b/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorDerived.h
@@ -1,5 +1,8 @@
 #pragma once
 
+#define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS
+#include <inttypes.h>
+
 $th_headers
 
 #include "ATen/Tensor.h"
```
